SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS_DET. */
INSERT INTO H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS_DET (Id_Periodo, Id_Posicion_prestacion, Id_Tipo_Orden, Nro_Orden, Fecha_Proceso_orden, Id_Origen_Envio_Orden, Id_Estado_Aut_Orden, Afiliado, SubNumero, Secuencia, Id_Persona, Id_Producto, Id_SubProducto, Id_Plan_Producto,Id_Forma_Pago_orden, Id_Estado_Orden, Id_Usuario_Carga, Id_Usuario_Auditor, Hora_Ingreso_orden, Fecha_Entrega_Orden, Id_Signo_Orden, Id_Prestacion, Cant_Prestaciones, Id_Prestacion_Autorizada, Id_Origen_Prestacion, Id_Motivo_Auditoria,Id_Usuario_Operador_Auditor, id_marca_int_breve) SELECT [Id_Periodo],[Id_Posicion],[Id_Tipo_Orden] ,[Nro_Orden],[Fecha_Proceso],[Id_Origen_Envio_Orden],[Id_Estado_Autorizacion] as Id_Estado_Aut_Orden,[Cuenta] as Afiliado,[SubCuenta] as SubNumero,[Secuencia] as Secuencia,[Id_Persona],[Id_Producto],[Id_SubProducto],[Id_Plan_Producto],[Id_Forma_Pago],[Id_Estado_Orden],[Id_Usuario] as Id_Usuario_Carga,[Id_Usuario_Auditoria] as Id_Usuario_Auditor,[Id_Hora_Ingreso] as Hora_Ingreso,[Fecha_Entrega],[Id_Signo_Registro],CAST([Id_Nomenclador]as CHAR(2))+ CAST([de_codigo_prestacion] AS CHAR(8)) AS Id_Prestacion,[Cant_Prestaciones],[Id_Prestacion_Autorizada],Id_Origen_Prestacion,Id_Motivo_Auditoria,ID_Usuario_Operador_Auditor,0 FROM [DW_SALUD].[dbo].[AUX_H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS_DET]
/* Actualiza Internaciones Breves (implementado a partir de Febrero 2017). */
-- Crea una temporal que contiene los datos de la as400. SELECT * INTO #TEMP FROM OPENQUERY (HOST03, 'SELECT OW1TOR, OW1POS, F.OW1NOR, OW1NRP, W03BRV FROM SMPORDD.O01FMOR F INNER JOIN SMPORDD.O03FAUT T ON (F.OW1POS=T.W03POS) AND (F.OW1NRP=T.W03NRP) WHERE OW1FPR >= 20170201') F
-- Crea un indice para optimizar la performance. CREATE nonclustered index [ord_pos_nor] ON dbo.#TEMP (OW1TOR,OW1POS,OW1NOR) INCLUDE (OW1NRP,W03BRV)
-- Actualiza la tabla H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS_DET con la marca 1 si es s y sino es s, con 0. UPDATE H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS_DET SET ID_MARCA_INT_BREVE = CASE WHEN W03BRV <> 'S' then 0 else 1 end FROM H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS_DET H JOIN #TEMP T ON (T.OW1TOR = H.Id_Tipo_Orden AND T.OW1POS = H.Id_Posicion_Prestacion AND T.OW1NOR = H.Nro_Orden ) WHERE H.id_periodo = (select max(id_periodo) from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) and H.Nro_Orden <> 0
-- Actualiza la tabla H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS con la marca 1 si es s y sino es s, con 0. UPDATE H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS SET ID_MARCA_INT_BREVE = CASE WHEN W03BRV <> 'S' then 0 else 1 end FROM H_ORDENES_PROCESADAS H INNER JOIN #TEMP T ON (T.OW1TOR = H.Id_Tipo_Orden AND T.OW1POS = H.Id_Posicion_Prestacion AND T.OW1NOR = H.Nro_Orden ) WHERE H.id_periodo = (select max(id_periodo) from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA) and H.Nro_Orden <> 0

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowset

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.
property.name: OpenRowsetVariable

property.description: The SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommand

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destinaton. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection
